title: Anime Attire
description: A web app built with ReactJs for an anime store. With the power of Redux-Toolkit, users can view, search, filter, and add/remove items from their cart.
alt: desktop and iPhone next to each other with the Anime Attire webpage open

title: StreamVic
description: A web app built with ReactJs that allows users to browse movie/tv show information and save their favorites. I used the TMDB API to fetch movie/tvshow data and output content dynamically to the webpage. Users can use the API to also search for a particular movie/tv show.
alt: desktop and iPhone next to each other with the StreamVic webpage open

title: Italian Pie
description: Italian Pie is a dynamic landing page with page transition and scroll animations
alt: desktop and iPhone next to each other with the Italian Pie webpage open

title: Weather App
description: A weather app built using the OpenWeather API. Users can search for the current weather of a city as well as the 3 day forecast.
alt: desktop and iPhone next to each other with https://weatherapp-victormtzcodes.netlify.app/ webapp open

title: Easybank Agency
description: A landing page created for a digital banking agency.
alt: desktop and iPhone next to each other with easybank-digital-landing.netlify.app open

title: RPS
description: Rock paper Scissors game challenge from Frontend Mentor. Users can play against the computer and view a rules pop up modal.
alt: desktop and iPhone next to each other with my rps webapp open

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: A game of Tic Tac Toe built with vanilla JavaScript. Key concepts covered include Arrays & Event listeners
alt: desktop and iPhone next to each other with my tic tac toe app open

title: Tesla Clone
description: A Tesla clone landing page I created by eyeballing the original Tesla website. Created with HTML CSS & JavaScript
alt: desktop and iPhone next to each other with my Tesla clone webpage open

title: Interactive Price Comp
description: An Interactive Pricing Component complete with custom range input slider and pricing toggle. Yearly toggle and input change update the UI accordingly
alt: desktop and iPhone next to each other with interactiveprice-victormtzcodes.netlify.app open

title: Sunnyside Agency
description: A website for an agency with assets provided from FrontendMentor
alt: desktop and iPhone next to each other with sunnysideagency-victormtzcodes.netlify.app open

title: Deep Reef
description: A landing page for a company investing in the stock market. I used this project to brush up on my TailwindCSS skills.
alt: desktop and iPhone next to each other with the Deep Reef webpage open

title: Cake O' Clock
description: A landing page for a cupcake company. I used this project to learn how to use the React Alice Carousel.
alt: desktop and iPhone next to each other with the Cake O Clock webpage open

title: Stopwatch
description: A stopwatch that can be started, paused, and reset built with vanilla JavaScript
alt: desktop and iPhone next to each other with the stopwatch webpapp open

title: ZA Sport
description: A landing page for a gym. This was the first project I built with TailwindCSS. I also used this project to get more comfortable with CSS Grid layouts in the gallery section
alt: desktop and iPhone next to each other with the ZA Sport webpage open

title: Dropdown Navigation
description: Dropdown Navigation challenge from Frontend Mentor. The challenge was to test my ability to create a dropdown nav menu, and allow users to view the relevant dropdown menus on desktop and mobile when interacting with the navigation links.
alt: desktop and iPhone next to each other with my Intro Section webpage open

title: Ping Coming Soon Page
description: Ping Coming Soon Page challenge from Frontend Mentor. The challenge was to get the design looking as close as possible and allow users to submit their email using an input field. They should recieve an error if the form is submitted empty or with an invalid email
alt: desktop and iPhone next to each other with my Ping Coming Soon webpage open

title: Tip Calculator
description: Tip Calculator challenge from Frontend Mentor. Users are able to View the optimal layout for the app depending on their device's screen size, See hover states for all interactive elements on the page, Calculate the correct tip and total cost of the bill per person
alt: desktop and iPhone next to each other with my tip calculator webpage open

title: Advice Generator App
description: Advice Generator App challenge from Frontend Mentor. Built using the Advice Slip API, users are able to view the optimal layout for the app depending on their device's screen size, see hover states for all interactive elements on the page, & generate a new piece of advice by clicking the dice icon
alt: desktop and iPhone next to each other with my tip calculator webpage open

title: QR code component
description: A FrontendMentor challenge built with HTML and CSS. The challenge was to build out the QR Code Component and get it looking as close to the design as possible.
alt: desktop and iPhone next to each other with my QR code webpage open

title: NFT Preview Card
description: A FrontendMentor challenge built with HTML and CSS. The challenge was to build out the NFT Preview Card and get it looking as close to the design as possible.
alt: desktop and iPhone next to each other with my NFT card webpage open

title: Order Summary Card
description: A FrontendMentor challenge built with HTML and CSS. The challenge was to build out the Order Summary Card and get it looking as close to the design as possible.
alt: desktop and iPhone next to each other with my order summary card webpage open
